title: Citadel Gate
description: The East Gate or Citadel Gate was located on the southeast side of the citadel of Nineveh and it was one of several gates from which the upper town could be accessed from the lower town via a long, stone ramp.

properties.description: The representative, estimated location of the temple is based on comparing Reade, RLA 9 (2000), 391, fig. 2 to satellite imagery.
properties.title: Representative Location of the Citadel Gate
